</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Sets if group icons added with [[addGroupIcon]] are visible on map and in the HUD.<br><br>
<template lineStart="1"><title>Feature arma3</title><part><name index="1"/><value> Since Arma 3 v1.93.145657 this command returns [[Nothing]] as it should</value></part></template> </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''setGroupIconsVisible''' [showOnMap, showOnHUD] </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> [showOnMap, showOnHUD]: [[Array]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> showOnMap: [[Boolean]] - [[true]] to show on map. Default - [[false]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> showOnHUD: [[Boolean]] - [[true]] to show on HUD. Default - [[false]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER3</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]] (prior to Arma 3 v1.93.145657 this command returned [[Object]] of [[objNull | null]] value) </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value> 


</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[setGroupIconsVisible]] [true,true];  
([[group]] [[player]]) [[addGroupIcon]] ["b_inf", [0, 0]];</code></value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>
